product_title: Aleili Snake Printed Platform Wedge Sandal
product_description: Interlocking snake-embossed straps at the vamp heighten the chic look of a sandal set on a cork-wrapped platform wedge that gives you a legs-for-days look.
product_details_and_care:
Interlocking snake-embossed straps at the vamp heighten the chic look of a sandal set on a cork-wrapped platform wedge that gives you a legs-for-days look.
4" (100mm) heel
Adjustable strap with buckle closure
